name: Vegan Cobb Salad
description: Bring this hearty and filling Vegan Cobb Salad to brunch, picnics, or potlucks. Made with tempeh bacon and red wine vinaigrette, it’s easy to customize and loaded with protein.
recipeIngredient: 8 ounce package tempeh, chopped into 1/2 inch pieces
1 cup diced vegan cheese, I used Violife's Smoked Cheddar Block

itemListElement.text: In a large pan over medium-high heat, warm the oil then add the tempeh pieces and sauté for 3-4 minutes, stirring frequently.
itemListElement.name: In a large pan over medium-high heat, warm the oil then add the tempeh pieces and sauté for 3-4 minutes, stirring frequently.

itemListElement.text: Now add the soy sauce, maple syrup, liquid smoke and garlic powder to the pan and stir to coat the tempeh. Cook for another 1-2 minutes, then remove from heat and set aside.
itemListElement.name: Now add the soy sauce, maple syrup, liquid smoke and garlic powder to the pan and stir to coat the tempeh. Cook for another 1-2 minutes, then remove from heat and set aside.

itemListElement.text: In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, vinegar, garlic, maple syrup, dijon mustard, oregano, salt and pepper. Or place all ingredients in a small mason jar with a lid and shake until combined.
itemListElement.name: In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, vinegar, garlic, maple syrup, dijon mustard, oregano, salt and pepper. Or place all ingredients in a small mason jar with a lid and shake until combined.

itemListElement.text: Place the chopped lettuce in a large bowl or platter. Arrange the tomatoes, avocados, red onion, sunflower seeds, chickpeas, optional vegan cheese and tempeh bacon in lines over the greens.
itemListElement.name: Place the chopped lettuce in a large bowl or platter. Arrange the tomatoes, avocados, red onion, sunflower seeds, chickpeas, optional vegan cheese and tempeh bacon in lines over the greens.

itemListElement.text: Whisk or shake the dressing once more before drizzling over the salad. You may not need all of the dressing. Serve immediately.
itemListElement.name: Whisk or shake the dressing once more before drizzling over the salad. You may not need all of the dressing. Serve immediately.
